name: Please Stay
description:
Keep your party alive.

Your guests are arriving! Keep them entertained - have a chat, give them a drink, turn up the music for a dance (but not for too long - or the police will show up), and if things really start to slow down... Dip into your stash of gogo-powder. Do anything to stave off the loneliness.

INSTRUCTIONS

Left click - Click a button to perform an action (make a cockatil, turn on/off the soundsystem, etc). You can also click your guests to interact with them.

Right click - Go to location.

Made by topbraj in 48 hours for LD46 (“Keep it alive”).
